Actions.Name: Send signature request from template
Actions.Description: Create and send a new signature request based off an existing template.

Actions.Name: Get signature request
Actions.Description: Get a signature request that includes the current status for each signer.

Actions.Name: When a signature request is created
Actions.Description: Triggers when a new signature request is created.

Actions.Name: When a signature request is completed
Actions.Description: Triggers when a signature request is completed by all parties.

Actions.Name: When a signature request is declined
Actions.Description: Triggers when a signature request is decline.
